content.content: 1. (1) An application for a prospector’s licence under subsection 19 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 0220. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (1). (2) Assessment work performed on mining lands under subsection 65 (2) of the Act, including exploration work referred to in subsection 66 (3) of the Act, shall be reported in Form 0241. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (2). (3) A notice of abandonment or partial abandonment under section 70 of the Act shall be in Form 0227. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (3). (4) An application to exchange a lease under subsection 83 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 0228. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (4). (5) An application for a lease of surface rights under subsection 84 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 0229. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (5). (6) A notice of project status under clause 140 (1) (a) or 141 (1) (a) or subsection 144 (1) shall be in Form 1. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (6). (7) A notice of material change under subsection 144 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 2. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (7). (8) A notice of an intention to retain an interest in surrendered mining lands under subsection 183 (2) shall be in Form 0230. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (8). (9) The forms are available on the Internet through the Ministry website at www.ndm.gov.on.ca. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (9).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) An application for a prospector’s licence under subsection 19 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 0220. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (1).

(2) Assessment work performed on mining lands under subsection 65 (2) of the Act, including exploration work referred to in subsection 66 (3) of the Act, shall be reported in Form 0241. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (2).

(3) A notice of abandonment or partial abandonment under section 70 of the Act shall be in Form 0227. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (3).

(4) An application to exchange a lease under subsection 83 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 0228. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (4).

(5) An application for a lease of surface rights under subsection 84 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 0229. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (5).

(6) A notice of project status under clause 140 (1) (a) or 141 (1) (a) or subsection 144 (1) shall be in Form 1. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (6).

(7) A notice of material change under subsection 144 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 2. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (7).

(8) A notice of an intention to retain an interest in surrendered mining lands under subsection 183 (2) shall be in Form 0230. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (8).

(9) The forms are available on the Internet through the Ministry website at www.ndm.gov.on.ca. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 1 (9).

content.content: 2. (1) An application to record a staked mining claim under subsection 44 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 0223. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (1). (2) A transfer of an unpatented mining claim or any interest in an unpatented mining claim under section 59 of the Act shall be in Form 0239. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (2). (3) A dispute against a recorded claim under section 48 of the Act shall be in Form 0237. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (3). (4) A notice of restaking of transferred claim under subsection 48 (8.1) shall be in Form 0225. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (4). (5) A notice of intention to perform assessment work under section 78 of the Act shall be in Form 0242. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (5). (6) An application for determination of surface rights compensation under subsection 79 (4) shall be in Form 0253. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (6). (7) A notice of appeal under subsection 112 (3) shall be in Form 0252. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (7). (8) An inspection warrant under subsection 146 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 3. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (8). (9) A search warrant under subsection 146 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 4. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (9). (10) A notice to require a hearing under Part VII of the Act shall be in Form 5. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (10).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) An application to record a staked mining claim under subsection 44 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 0223. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (1).

(2) A transfer of an unpatented mining claim or any interest in an unpatented mining claim under section 59 of the Act shall be in Form 0239. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (2).

(3) A dispute against a recorded claim under section 48 of the Act shall be in Form 0237. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (3).

(4) A notice of restaking of transferred claim under subsection 48 (8.1) shall be in Form 0225. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (4).

(5) A notice of intention to perform assessment work under section 78 of the Act shall be in Form 0242. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (5).

(6) An application for determination of surface rights compensation under subsection 79 (4) shall be in Form 0253. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (6).

(7) A notice of appeal under subsection 112 (3) shall be in Form 0252. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (7).

(8) An inspection warrant under subsection 146 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 3. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (8).

(9) A search warrant under subsection 146 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 4. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (9).

(10) A notice to require a hearing under Part VII of the Act shall be in Form 5. O. Reg. 195/06, s. 2 (10).
